rows.label: bf06120140_0010
rows.name:
To be precise, it is an Device,
a servant of the Holy Grail.

rows.label: bf06120140_0030
rows.name:
So if that thingy is Hikari's,
then what did it attack us for?!

rows.label: bf06120140_0050
rows.name:
Serpent was felled in the ancient battle
with Metsu, sinking below the clouds...
